tasks.title: Project Setup and Environment
tasks.description: Initialize the basic project structure, dependencies, and development environment for the Digital Ant Farm simulation.
tasks.notes: Foundation for all other development work

tasks.title: Core Ant Entity System
tasks.description: Implement the basic ant entity with position, state, and behavior management system.
subtasks: Create Ant class with position tracking
Create ant spawn and lifecycle management
tasks.notes: Core foundation for all ant behaviors

tasks.title: Colony Management System
tasks.description: Implement central colony management with spawn point and basic statistics tracking.
subtasks: Create Colony class with central spawn point
Add colony statistics tracking (population, food collected)
tasks.notes: Central hub for managing ant population and resources

tasks.title: Food Source Generation
tasks.description: Implement random food source placement with varying concentrations and depletion mechanics.
subtasks: Create FoodSource class with position and quantity
tasks.notes: Provides the primary resource for ant survival

tasks.title: Basic Pheromone System
tasks.description: Implement food trail pheromones that decay over time and influence ant pathfinding.
subtasks: Create Pheromone class with position and strength
Create pheromone influence on ant movement
Implement efficient pheromone storage and retrieval
tasks.notes: Core communication system for ant coordination

tasks.title: Movement and Pathfinding
tasks.description: Implement ant movement mechanics with random walk and pheromone-influenced pathfinding.
tasks.notes: Determines how ants navigate the environment

tasks.title: Parameter Control Interface
tasks.description: Create real-time sliders for adjusting core behavioral parameters during simulation.

tasks.title: Colony Statistics Display
tasks.description: Create live display of colony population, food collected, and efficiency metrics.

tasks.title: Simulation Controls
tasks.description: Implement play/pause, speed adjustment, and reset functionality for the simulation.

tasks.title: Visual Rendering System
tasks.description: Implement clear visual distinction between ants, food, trails, and colony with appealing graphics.
tasks.notes: Makes the simulation visually engaging and clear

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize simulation to handle 500+ ants at 60 FPS with efficient memory management.
subtasks: Add spatial partitioning for collision detection

tasks.title: Documentation and Testing
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation and implement testing framework for the simulation.
subtasks: Implement unit tests for core components
tasks.notes: Ensures code quality and user accessibility
